full_summary:
<details>
  <summary> Tender Information for F3045-220318 - Buoys Maintenance Madeleine Islands</summary>
  
### Tender Information

**Reference Number:** WS3615173566-Doc3615725000
**Solicitation Number:** WS3615173566
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Publication Date:** 2022-10-18
**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-11-16T14:00:00

**Contract Details:**

* **Duration:** The expected contract start date is not specified, and the expected end date is September 30, 2024.
* **Contract Category:** Service Category (SRV)
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Procurement Scope:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites contractors to submit a proposal for the maintenance services of buoys and their accessories for the Ile-de-la-Madeleine region. The procurement scope is detailed in Section 7 of the Request for Proposal document.

**Trade Agreements:**

The following trade agreements apply to this tender:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

**Regions of Opportunity:**

The tender is open to contractors who can fulfill the requirements in the specified regions. 

**Regions of Delivery:**

The delivery will take place in Quebec (except NCR).

### Contact Information

**Contracting Entity:**

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* Contact: Simon Presse (simon.presse@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

</details>
